meanings.definition: A list of items to be checked or consulted.
meanings.sent1: I always use checklists to make sure I don't forget anything when packing for a trip.
meanings.sent2: She followed the checklist to ensure all the necessary ingredients were in the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The detective's checklist of clues led him to solve the mystery in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her checklist of goals for the year was like a roadmap to success.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's checklist for grading papers made the process much more organized.

meanings.definition: A list of things to be done.
meanings.sent1: My daily checklist includes tasks like homework and chores.
meanings.sent2: The project manager created a detailed checklist to keep track of deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The checklist of errands seemed never-ending, but she tackled them one by one.
meanings.sent4: His mental checklist of priorities helped him stay focused during the busy week.
meanings.sent5: The checklist of repairs for the house was daunting, but they tackled it together.
